name: The Day The Machine Stopped
description:
The world is dying.
The people are dead.
The trees are dead.
The machine has stopped.

Navigate through a dying empty world, explore, and learn about it through inspecting places and objects of interest. This game can be completed very quickly, but it does have a branching path. You cannot find all the information or dialogue in one run through of the game.

PS: Thank you for checking out my game!
